tossup_question: 14) EARTH AND SPACE  The stars Merak and Dubhe in the bowl of the big dipper are most commonly used to locate what star?
tossup_answer: ANSWER: POLARIS (ACCEPT: POLE STAR; NORTH STAR; ALPHA URSA MINORIS)
bonus_question: 14) EARTH AND SPACE  The main asteroid belt is located immediately between what two planets?
bonus_answer: ANSWER: MARS AND JUPITER (in any order)
